snippet: WITTENBERG--Carmen Rita, died peacefully at home, at age 88, on April 9, 2016. She loved The New York Times crosswords, Turner Classic Movies, pasta from Gennaro's, and her family. We loved her dearly and will all miss her very much. 1/3
lead_paragraph: WITTENBERG--Carmen Rita, died peacefully at home, at age 88, on April 9, 2016. She loved The New York Times crosswords, Turner Classic Movies, pasta from Gennaro's, and her family. We loved her dearly and will all miss her very much. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WITTENBERG, CARMEN RITA
